dream_summary: In this dream, I wandered through an enchanting forest filled with towering ancient trees and a serene starlit sky, evoking feelings of peace and wonder.

scenes.visual_prompt: A lush forest filled with towering, ancient trees. The bark is a deep brown, intertwined with glowing moss. The canopy is opened just enough to reveal a starlit sky shining through, casting a cool, mystical blue glow. Fireflies dance around, giving the scene an ethereal vibe. The ground is covered with soft, vibrant green ferns and flowers, creating a sense of tranquility. A gentle mist floats around the tree trunks.
scenes.voiceover_script: As I entered the forest, I was enveloped in tranquility, surrounded by towering trees whispering ancient secrets under a starlit sky.

scenes.visual_prompt: A wider view of the forest as I walk deeper, revealing pathways lined with glimmers of light. The trees seem to stretch infinitely into the night sky. A small clearing ahead glows with a soft, golden light, as if inviting me further in. The atmosphere is filled with a magical essence, with a slight breeze causing the leaves to shimmer. The sky is a deep indigo with bright, twinkling stars.
scenes.voiceover_script: Deeper into the forest, I felt the magic around me intensify; every step I took resonated with peace, awakening wonder from within.
